modName: Apocalypse - PerMa - PerMa Defluffed Perk Description Compatibility
summary:
OBSOLETE!
Starting from 8.01 the PerMa Defluffing Perks already includes the same patch in Optional downloads. Please use it instead.

Compatibility patch for Apocalypse - PerMa Compatibility and PerMa Defluffed Perk Descriptions mods
descriptionHtml:
Provides compatibility between Apocalypse - PerMa Compatibility Patch.esp and PerMaDefluffedPerkDescriptions.esp.

Load order:

PerMaDefluffedPerkDescriptions.esp
Apocalypse - PerMa Compatibility Patch.esp
Apocalypse - PerMa - PerMaDefluffedPerkDescriptions.esp

Update 06 April 2015 - fully supports latest PerMa 1.2a and Apocalypse 7.07
author: Ray Rios
